titleInfo.title: Treasures on camels' humps
titleInfo.subTitle: historical and literary studies from the ancient Near East presented to Israel Ephʻal

mods.tableOfContents: Hunting in the epic of Gilgamesh: speculations on the education of a prince / Tsvi Abusch -- Ezekiel and Egypt / Shmuel Ahituv -- What kind of treaty tradition do the Sefire inscriptions represent? / Amnon Altman -- "All the nations and many people": the answer of Isaiah and Micah to Assyrian Imperial policies / Pinhas Artzi -- Crossing the boundaries: literary allusions to the epic of Gilgamesh in the account of Esarhaddon's Egyptian campaign / Amitai Baruchi-Unna -- The Assyrian Stela fragment from Ben-Shemhen / Mordechai Cogan -- A pugnacious strike from Uruk / M.A. Damdamayev -- A new look at a Neo-Assyrian sale of "land and people" / Gershon Galil -- The wandering lament: Micah 1:10-16 / Yair Hoffman -- New light on an old find from Hazor / Wayne Horowitz and Takayoshi Oshima -- "Shutting up" the enemy - literary gleanings from Sargon's eighth campaign / Victor Avigdor Hurowitz --

Piankhy's instructions to his army in Kush and their execution / Dan'el Kahn -- Recruitment of foreign soldiers into the Neo-Assyrian Army during the reign of Tiglath-pileser III / Yehuda Kaplan-- Four early Mesopotamian 'builidng' inscriptions from the Moussaieff collection / Jacob Klein -- Esarhaddon's eastern campaign / Erle Leichty -- The hosts of the mountain / Edward Lipiński -- Peace and war at Nuzi: a prosopographical foray / M.P. Maidman -- The Suhu governors' inscriptions in the context of Mesopotamian royal inscriptions / Nadav Na'aman -- The chronology of the Idumean Ostraca in the decade or so after the death of Alexander the Great and its relevance for historical events / Bezalel Porten and Ada Yardeni -- On siege warfare in Hittite texts / Itamar Singer -- Assyria at the gates of Tushpa / Hayim Tadmor -- Are trees of the field human? A Biblical war law (Deuteronomy 20:19-20) and Neo-Assyrian propoganda / Nili Wazana -- Qurdi-Assur-lamur: his letters and career / Shigeo Yamada -- Neo-Assyrian notes / Ron Zadok -- Nebuchadnezzar's campaign in the 30th year (575 B.C.): a conflict with Tyre / Stefan Zawadski.
mods.note: edited by Mordechai Cogan and Dan'el Kahn.
Includes bibliography of the works of Israel Ephʻal.

titleInfo.title: Producción y comercio del aceite en la Antigüedad
titleInfo.subTitle: primer congreso internacional

name.namePart: Congreso Internacional sobre el Aceite en la Antigüedad 1978 : Madrid, Spain)

mods.tableOfContents: Presentación / M. Fernández-Galiano -- Introducción / J.M. Blázquez -- Introducción [in French] / M. Ponsich -- Heinrich Dressel / M. Blech -- Exportación del aceite hispano en el Imperio romano : estado de la cuestión / J.M. Blázquez -- Nouvelles perspectives sur l'olivier du Bas-Guadalquivir dans l'Antiquité / Michel Ponsich -- Monte Testaccio, hoy : nuevos testimonios epigráficos / E. Rodríguez-Almeida -- Alcuni aspetti della topografia e dell'archeologia attorno al monte Testaccio / E. Rodríguez-Almeida -- Reflejos económicos y sociales en la producción de ánforas olearias béticas / José Remesal Rodríguez -- D. Caecilius Hospitalis et M. Iulius Hermesianus / André Tchernia -- Amphores à huile de l'épave Saint-Gervais 3 à Fos-sur-mer : premières observations sur les inscriptions peintes / Bernard Liou -- Epave Port-Vendres II : nouveaux documents épigraphiques / Dali Colls, Robert Lequément -- Comercio del aceite en el valle del Ebro a finales de la República y comienzos del Imperio romano / Miguel Beltrán Lloris -- Commercio oleario e moneta nell' Atene dei secoli VI e V / M.A. Levi -- Evolución de las exportaciones béticas durante el Imperio / R. Pascual Guasch -- Olivo y el aceite en las literaturas clásicas / S. Mariner -- Aceite en la civilización micénica / J.L. Melena -- Rentabilidad del oliveo en el mundo romano / J.L. Ramírez Sádaba -- Continuidad o discontinuidad de la producción oleícola hispana durante la Antigüedad Tardía (ss. V-VII)? / Luis A. García Moreno.
mods.note: [coordinó la edición, José María Blazquez Martínez].
"Bajo el patronato de: Ministerio de Cultura, Universidad Complutense, Consejo Oleícola Internacional, Casa de Velázquez, Fundación Pastor de Estudios Clásicos."
"Celebrado en Madrid ... 4 al 6 diciembre de 1978, en la Fundación Pastor de Estudios Clásicos"--P. [9].
Contributions in Spanish, French, or Italian.

titleInfo.title: Aigaio stēn prōimē epochē tou sidērou
titleInfo.subTitle: praktika tou diethnous symposiou, Rhodos, 1-4 Noemvriou 2002

originInfo.publisher: Hyp. Po., Archailogiko Institouto Aigaiakōn Spoudōn

physicalDescription.extent: xv, 542 p. : ill., maps, plans ; 29 cm.

mods.tableOfContents: Krētē. Diataxē tōn hoikismōn kai hoi koinōniko-oikonomikes hallages stēn Krētē kata tēn Prōimē Epochē tou Sidērou / Sarro Wallace -- Metaschēmatismos tēs krētikēs koinōnias kata ta telē tēs 2ēs kai tis arches tēs 1ēs prochristianikēs chilietias / Napoleōn Xipharas -- Kydōnia tēs dytikēs Krētēs sta prōima chronia tou Sidērou / Maria Andreadakē-Vlazakē -- Emporikos rolos tēs kentirikēs Krētēs kata ton 9o kai 8o ai. p.Ch. / Elenē Goula -- Eleutherna tēs Prōimēs Epochēs tou Sidērou : scheseis me to Aigaio kai tēn anatolikē Mesogeio / Nikolaos Stampolidēs -- Mnēmes tēs aristokratias apo tēn Orthē Petra tēs geōmetrikēs Eleuthernas / Anagnōstēs Agelarakēs -- Vaso da filtro da Arkades e i contatti tra Creta e il centro Italia tirrenico / Giacomo Biondi -- Prōtogeōmetrikos oikismos stē Gria Vigla Moirōn stē notia Krētē / Antōnēs Vasilakēs -- Homērika stoicheia stēn akropolē Smariou / Despoina Chatzē-Vallianou -- Periptōsē prōimōn symposiōn hē aplōs hērōolatreias : geōmetrikē anakatalēpsē sto Chalasmeno Ierapetras / Metaxia Tsipopoulou -- Late Geometric ship from Khalasmenos / Michael Wedde -- Cemetery of Krya, district of Seteia : developments at the end of the Late Bronze Age and the beginning of the Eary Iron Age in east Crete / Athanasia Kanta, Kostis Davaras -- In merito alla classe dei cosidetti aryballio rodio cretesi / Lorenza Grasso, Lighea Pappalardo, Francesco Paolo Romano --

Anatoliko Aigaio. Apo ta nekrotapheia tēs archaias Ialysou : duo geōmetrikes taphes stēn Kremastē Rodou / Elenē Pharmakidou -- Hiero tēs Geōmetrikēs kai Archaikēs periodou stēn Hēraklēs tēs Kō : mia prōtē parousiasē / Elpida Skerlou -- Geōmetrikē nekropolē archaias Samou / Maria Viglakē-Sophianou -- Wooden stools dall'Heraion di Samo : alcune osservazioni / Antonella Pautasso -- Prōtogeōmetrikē keramikē apo tēn Chio / Aglaia Archontidou-Argyrē -- Northern Aegean in the Early Iron Age : an assessment of the present picture / Massimo Cultraro -- Samothrakē stēn Prōimē Epochē tou Sidērou / Dēmētrēs Matsas -- Makedonia. Prōimē Epochē tou Sidērou sto Nomo Dramas / Katerina Peristerē -- Akanthos stēn Prōimē Epochē tou Sidērou / Elenē Trakosopoulou-Salakidou -- Euchōria diakosmēmenē keramikē apo to nekrotapheio tēs archaias Mendēs / Sophia Moschonēsiōtē -- Panepistēmiakes anaskaphes sto Karampournaki Thessalonikēs kai hē parousia tōn Phoinikōn sto voreio Aigaio / Michalēs Tiverios -- Periochē tou Axiou stēn Prōimē Epochē tou Sidērou / Thōmē Savvopoulou -- Prōimē Epochē tou Sidērou stēn anatolikē parathermaikē zōnē : phaseis tēs Prōimēs Epochēs tou Sidērou stēn trapeza tēs Toumpas Thessalonikēs / Kōstas Souereph -- Tephrochrōmē trochēlatē keramikē tēs Epochēs tou Sidērou apo tēn Toumpa Thessalonikēs / Kōnstantoula Chavela -- Nekrotapheia tēs Prōimēs Epochēs tou Sidērou stē voreia Pieria / Giannēs Karliampas, Matthaios Besios, Sevē Triantaphyllou --

Kentrikē Hellada. Nea heurēmata tēs Hysterēs Epochēs tou Chalkou kai tēs Epochēs tou Sidērou stēn Halo / Zōē Malakasiōtē, Anna Mousiōnē -- Symvolē tou Ōrōpou stē meletē tōn hoikismōn tou Aigaiou tēs Prōimēs Epochēs tou Sidērou / Alexandros Mazarakēs Ainian -- Sul centauro di Lefkandi / Fabio Caruso -- Heleusina stēn Prōimē Epochē tou Sidērou / Kalliopē Papangelē -- Kyklades kai Kythēra. Kyklades stēn Prōimē Epochē tou Sidērou hōs tēn hysterē Archaikē epochē / Phōteinē N. Zapheiropoulou -- Andros kata tēn Prōimē Epochē tou Sidērou (100-600 p.Ch.) / Christina A. Televantou -- Tēnos kata tēn Prōimē Epochē tou Sidērou / Nota Kourou -- Despotiko : hē anakalypsē enos neou hierou / Giannos Kouragios -- Palaiokastro Kythērōn : geōmetrika kai archaika / Iōannēs E. Petrocheilos -- Varia. From tribe to state in the Greek Early Iron Age : the archaeological evidence from Lefkandi and Zagora / Alexandra Coucouzeli -- Chrēsē tou chrōmatos stēn anaglyphē keramikē / Eva Sēmantōnē-Bournia -- Apo ta sēmeia kerameōs stēn alphavētikē graphē : mythos kai archaiologikē martyria / Christos G. Doumas -- Epinikies giortes, agalmata nikētōn kai hē tautotēta tōn Aiginētōn / Elena Walter-Karydē.
mods.note: At head of title: Panepistēmio Krētēs, Hyp. Po., Archailogiko Institouto Aigaiakōn Spoudōn.
Contributions chiefly in Greek, with four in English and four in Italian.
